subject: Fines (Penalties)
Football
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L.’s penalty put the strength coach Sal Alosi, who was already punished after bumping a Dolphins player, in a tenuous position with the team.
snippet: The N.F.L.’s penalty put the strength coach Sal Alosi, who was already punished after bumping a Dolphins player, in a tenuous position with the team.
